# Imports
import requests
import json
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.functions import from_json, col, explode, lit
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

#Variables that need to be set
storage_account = 'stoeaesola'
keyVaultName = "oladevkeyvault"
secretKey = "olaoauth2functionkey"
linkedServiceName = "AzureKeyVault"
use_test_env = False
oAuth2TokenBaseUrl = f"https://olagoogleoauth2.azurewebsites.net/api/GetOAuth2Token"

# Prod / Test Toggle
if use_test_env:
    stage1 = 'abfss://test-env@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net/stage1'
    stage2 = 'abfss://test-env@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net/stage2'
    stage3 = 'abfss://test-env@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net/stage3'
else:
    stage1 = 'abfss://stage1@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net'
    stage2 = 'abfss://stage2@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net'
    stage3 = 'abfss://stage3@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net'

# Fetch Google Classroom API Bearer Token
ss = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
sc = spark.sparkContext
token_library = ss._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
code = token_library.getSecret(keyVaultName, secretKey, linkedServiceName)
oAuth2TokenUrl = f"{oAuth2TokenBaseUrl}?code={code}"
r = requests.get(oAuth2TokenUrl)
tokenJson = json.loads(r.text);
bearerToken = f"Bearer {tokenJson['token']}"
bearerToken = "Bearer ya29.a0AfH6SMA-Hd153JQo9P6HrBwYhuwoTnN9vA9gqOaF_eZ21Ln6tqTWJ-2c3wlhYQP6frKerfOnSBgfg6zghtoK5vouXdLurbERIftC1jWKYUxVg-U6ZEYYYtH_MIi3R_-FwmjxtXPcwzXMxiUPh7YiyRQd0Wv-TA"

# Process Stage 1 Courses
# Request JSON from Google Classroom API
# Save in stage 1 container
def processStage1Courses():
    # Load Google Classroom courses data into data frame and save to stage 1
    headers = getRequestHeaders()
    r = requests.get(f"https://classroom.googleapis.com/v1/courses", headers=headers)
    coursesJson = json.dumps(json.loads(r.text)["courses"]);
    coursesDf = spark.read.json(sc.parallelize([coursesJson]))
    coursesDf.write.format('json').mode('overwrite').save(stage1 + '/googleclassroom/courses')
    return coursesDf

# Process Stage 2 Course Students
# Convert from JSON to Parquet
# Save in stage 2 container

def processStage2CourseStudents():
    sourceData = stage1 + f'/googleclassroom/students'
    try:
        df = spark.read.json(sourceData)
        dfCourseStudents = df.select("courseId", "userId")
        dfCourseStudents.write.format("parquet").mode("overwrite").save(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/coursestudents')

        dfUsers = df.select("userId", "profile.name.*").distinct()
        dfUsers.write.format("parquet").mode("overwrite").save(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/users')

        dfUserPermissions = df.select("userId", explode("profile.permissions.permission").alias("permission")).distinct()
        dfUserPermissions.write.format("parquet").mode("append").save(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/userpermissions')
    except AnalysisException as e:
        print (e)

# Process Stage 2 Course Teachers
# Convert from Parquet to Parquet
# Save in stage 2 container

def processStage2CourseTeachers():
    sourceData = stage1 + f'/googleclassroom/teachers'
    try:
        df = spark.read.json(sourceData)
        dfCourseTeachers = df.select("courseId", "userId")
        dfCourseTeachers.write.format("parquet").mode("overwrite").save(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/courseteachers')
        
        dfUsers = df.select("userId", "profile.name.*")
        dfUsers.write.format("parquet").mode("append").save(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/users')
        
        dfUserPermissions = df.select("userId", explode("profile.permissions.permission").alias("permission")).distinct()
        dfUserPermissions.write.format("parquet").mode("append").save(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/userpermissions')

    except AnalysisException as e:
        print (e)

# Process Stage 3 Users
# Convert from Parquet to Parquet
# Anonymize name
# Save in stage 3 container

def processStage3Users():
    sourceData = stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/users'
    try:
        df = spark.read.parquet(sourceData)
        df = df.withColumn("familyName", lit('*')).withColumn("fullName", lit('*')).withColumn("givenName", lit('*'))
        df.write.format("parquet").mode("overwrite").save(stage3 + f'/googleclassroom/users')
    except AnalysisException as e:
        print (e)

def processStage2Data():
    processStage2Courses()
    processStage2CourseAliases()
    processStage2CourseTeachers()
    processStage2CourseStudents()

def processStage3Data():
    processStage3Courses()
    processStage3CourseAliases()
    processStage3CourseTeachers()
    processStage3CourseStudents()
    processStage3Users()
    processStage3UserPermissions()

def processCourseRow(row):
    courseId = row["id"]
    ingestResource(courseId, "aliases")
    ingestResource(courseId, "students")
    ingestResource(courseId, "teachers")
def processStage1Data():
ingestStage1Data(processStage1Courses())

# Create spark db to allow for access to the data in the delta-lake via SQL on-demand.
# This is only creating metadata for SQL on-demand, pointing to the data in the delta-lake.
# This also makes it possible to connect in Power BI via the azure sql data source connector.
def create_spark_db(db_name, source_path):
    spark.sql('CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ' + db_name)
    try:
        google_entity = "courses"
        spark.sql("drop table if exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity}")  
        spark.sql("create table if not exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity} using PARQUET location '" + source_path + f"/{google_entity}'")  
        
        google_entity = "coursealiases"
        spark.sql("drop table if exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity}")  
        spark.sql("create table if not exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity} using PARQUET location '" + source_path + f"/{google_entity}'")  

        google_entity = "courseteachers"
        spark.sql("drop table if exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity}")  
        spark.sql("create table if not exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity} using PARQUET location '" + source_path + f"/{google_entity}'")  

        google_entity = "coursestudents"
        spark.sql("drop table if exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity}")  
        spark.sql("create table if not exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity} using PARQUET location '" + source_path + f"/{google_entity}'")  

        google_entity = "users"
        spark.sql("drop table if exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity}")  
        spark.sql("create table if not exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity} using PARQUET location '" + source_path + f"/{google_entity}'")  

        google_entity = "userpermissions"
        spark.sql("drop table if exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity}")  
        spark.sql("create table if not exists " + db_name + f".{google_entity} using PARQUET location '" + source_path + f"/{google_entity}'")  
    except AnalysisException:
        print(f"Table {google_entity} could not be created in {db_name}")

def clearSourceData(sourceData):
    mssparkutils.fs.mkdirs(sourceData)
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(sourceData, True)
    mssparkutils.fs.mkdirs(sourceData)

#Clear out previous data
def clearStage1Data():
    clearSourceData(stage1 + f'/googleclassroom/students')
    clearSourceData(stage1 + f'/googleclassroom/teachers')
    clearSourceData(stage1 + f'/googleclassroom/aliases')

#Clear out previous data
def clearStage2Data():
    clearSourceData(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/users')
    clearSourceData(stage2 + f'/googleclassroom/userpermissions')

#Clear out previous data
def clearStage3Data():
    clearSourceData(stage3 + f'/googleclassroom/users')
    clearSourceData(stage3 + f'/googleclassroom/userpermissions')

#clearStage1Data()
#clearStage2Data()
#clearStage3Data()
#processStage1Data()
#processStage2Data()
processStage3Data()

db_prefix = 'test_' if use_test_env else ''
create_spark_db(db_prefix + 's2_googleclassroom', stage2 + '/googleclassroom')
create_spark_db(db_prefix + 's3_googleclassroom', stage3 + '/googleclassroom')
